com.textmagic.sms.dto
Class Message

java.lang.Object
  com.textmagic.sms.dto.Message
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReceivedMessage, SentMessage
public class Message
extends java.lang.Object

The data transfer object Message is the base representation of all sms message objects being passed between TextMagic server and its clients.

The main attributes are:

  • id - the message primary key. The attribute unambiguously defines the message on server.
  • text - the sms message content

Author:
Rafael Bagmanov
